thread.title: BRIEF-All For One Steeb Q1 Group Earnings Up 4 Pct At 4.6 Mln Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-All For One Steeb Q1 Group Earnings Up 4 Pct At 4.6 Mln Euros
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - ALL FOR ONE STEEB AG:
* ALL FOR ONE STEEB AG FORGING AHEAD WITH ITS GROWTH STRATEGY. FIGURES FOR THE 1ST QUARTER OF FINANCIAL YEAR 2017/18ALL FOR ONE STEEB AG:
* Q1 SALES: EUR 91.8 MILLION (+16% OVER PRIOR YEAR) * Q1 CLOUD AND SOFTWARE REVENUES: EUR 58.2 MILLION (+18% OVER PRIOR YEAR)
* 2017/18 FORECAST CONFIRMED * Q1 GROUP EARNINGS: EUR 4.6 MILLION (+4% OVER PRIOR YEAR) * ‍Q1 EBIT: EUR 6.7 MILLION (+5% OVER PRIOR YEAR)​ * Q1 EBITDA INCREASED 9% TO EUR 9.2 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
